post.author: 나수환
post.content:
소프트 QA를 저희 회사에서 모집합니다. www.dyadem.com
참고로, 저가 인터뷰합니다.
많이 응모하세요.
alexna2003@yahoo.com

>Company announced 2nd Career Fair that will take place on Tues, October 5th from 12:00 pm - 8:00 pm at the Sheraton Parkway (Hwy 7 and Leslie).

post.title: [re] Job Fair at the Sherato Parkway (Hwy 7 & Leslie) on Tues
